markdownRemark.html:
Here is an easy-to-overlook, non-technical job interview tip that can boost your chances of landing your dream job. This tip can help both the interviewee and the hiring authority better maneuver through the interview process. It also aids in making every minute of an interview count in your favor!

Interview Tip ğŸ’¡

Prepare for being asked generic/general questions that the hiring company may ask. This includes questions like: â€œCan you tell me a little bit about yourself?â€ or â€œWhat got you interested in [insert company/company mission here]?â€.

These are such simple questions yet candidates fumble words around in attempt to express what was previously thought of as a simple answer to a simple question. As word-vomit spills out, a terror of intangible insecurity starts to fill the intervieweeâ€™s head space.
